body:
> But for a long time we have been recommending that people change import paths when they introduce backward-incompatible changes.

Noted. 

I don't have an answer for that at the moment, but as we've been doing that on Juju for some time now and found it terrible (duplicate imports, huge diffs twiddling import paths, weird errors when two values are not equal because they come from different copies of the same package), I really hope people haven't been taking that advice seriously.
